thread.title: Barack and Michelle Obama donate swing set to Washington shelter
thread.title_full: Barack and Michelle Obama donate swing set to Washington shelter

author: Megan Charles
title: Barack and Michelle Obama donate swing set to Washington shelter
text:
Barack and Michelle Obama donate swing set to Washington shelter Watch | Barack and Michelle Obama donate swing set to Washington shelter 00:49 Megan Charles  07am 
B arack and Michelle Obama donate their daughter's swing set to a family shelter in Washington, USA. Named "Malia and Sasha's Castle" the swing set was a surprise for the girls when they were seven and ten. 
The Obama's visit the shelter on Monday and joined in playing with the swing set and painting an indoor mural of Martin Luther King Jr. and butterflies.
